sources.title: The Last Home Run (1996) Fantasy, Sport | Tom Guiry, Danielle Comerford | Full Movie
sources.description:
If you stop dreaming... you stop living.
Dying doctor Jonathan Lyle's last wish is granted, to be young again and play baseball, but only for five days.

Director: Bob Gosse
Writers: Roger Flax, Ed Apfel
Stars: Tom Guiry, Danielle Comerford, Jonathan Flax, Jordi Vilasuso
Genres: Family, Fantasy, Sport
